function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher ventilation rates in buildings due to COVID-19 increase energy use","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential rebound effect on carbon emissions","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient strategies in buildings","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, occupancy sensors, natural ventilation","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers","Owner":"Facilities management, building owners"},{"Description":"Abnormal energy use intensity (BEUI) in municipal buildings during lockdown","Impact":"Higher energy consumption and potential inefficiency in energy use","Mitigation":"Implement energy efficiency strategies, conduct energy audits","Technologies":"Building automation systems, energy-efficient appliances, renewable energy systems","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers","Owner":"Facilities management, local government"},{"Description":"Differences in energy performance of buildings based on cultural and social aspects","Impact":"Inefficient energy use and potential wastage","Mitigation":"Incorporate cultural and social factors into energy planning and design","Technologies":"Behavioral change programs, community engagement, cultural sensitivity in building design","People":"Architects, urban planners, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building developers"}]}
